thread.title: WATCH: Anga and his bae get steamy for Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: WATCH: Anga and his bae get steamy for Valentine's Day - Times LIVE

author: TshisaLIVE
title: WATCH: Anga and his bae get steamy for Valentine's Day
text:
WATCH: Anga and his bae get steamy for Valentine's Day TshisaLIVE | 14 February, 2017 10:47 Meet Anga Makubalo's new bae Michaela.
Image by: Via Michaela Roy's Instagram Ladies, we're sorry to break it to you but you are going to have to cross Anga Makubalo off your dream Valentine's date list. Date My Family's Mdu Nyoni causes a 'stampede' among fans Ntsiki Mzwai shades Adele's 'humiliating' Beyoncé dedication Sfiso Ncwane's son pens heartbreaking Valentine's message SNAPS: Celebrity couples who serve Valentine's Day love envy
The musician and actor has been melting hearts across Mzansi for a while now and finally someone has stolen his heart.
Her name is Michaela Roy and she's been spotted getting real cozy with our Anga.
Ntsiki Mzwai shades Adele's 'humiliating' Beyoncé dedication Our suspicions were first raised when Anga posted a picture of himself with Michaela over the weekend. There was no caption to the pic but Michaela's was quick to claim her man, commenting "I love you baby" on the post.
A quick glimpse on her page also revealed a picture of the pair together, this time looking a little more intimate.
A few female fans were not happy about Anga finding love with someone else and they probably were even more angry when Michaela then posted a Valentine's Day video of the pair kissing passionately.
A post shared by Michaela Roy (@caelergang) on Feb 13, 2017 at 11:21pm PST
Here's some snaps of the happy couple.
A post shared by NaakMusiq (@iamnaakmusiq) on Feb 11, 2017 at 2:10pm PST
A post shared by Michaela Roy (@caelergang) on Feb 13, 2017 at 9:43am PST
